scripts.scheduler:batch: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:deploy && node dist/scheduler/batch.js
scripts.scheduler:annual-review-worker: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:deploy && node dist/scheduler/annualReview.js
scripts.scheduler:start-annual-review: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:deploy && node dist/scheduler/startAnnualReview.js
